project_plan.name: Simple Text-Based Game in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a simple text-based adventure game where the player can navigate through different rooms, pick up items, view their inventory, and face simple challenges.

task.name: Create item pickup and inventory management system
Add simple challenge encounters for the player
Implement player input handling for commands
Write tests for each of the functionality above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
